item.title: 台湾仁宝电子投资 3 亿美元加强美国业务
item.description: 台湾仁宝电子公司（Compal Electronics）周二表示，其董事会已批准一项在美国投资 3 亿美元的计划，以加强其在北美的运营和竞争力，重点是扩大其服务器业务。【原文：Taiwan’s Compal Electronics said on Tuesday its board has approved a $300 million investment plan in the United States to strengthen its operations and competitiveness in North America, with a focus on expanding its server business.】

item.title: 中国在西藏部署机器人羚羊以监视真正的羚羊群
item.description: 对于西藏的狼群来说，中国的第一只 "机器羚羊 "可能看起来就像在崎岖冻土带上漫步的真正羚羊一样令人食欲大增，但这种 "生物 "是中国政府不断加强监控的一部分，现在甚至已经深入到最偏远的地方。【原文：To the wolves of Tibet, China's first 'robot antelope' may look as appetising as the real herds that roam the rugged tundra, but the "creature" is part of Beijing's growing surveillance that now even reaches into its most remote places.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）称，福特将因车轴螺栓损坏召回超过 103,000 辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周二表示，福特将在美国召回超过10.3万辆F-150皮卡车，原因是车轴螺栓可能断裂，导致车辆侧翻或失去驱动力。【原文：Ford is recalling over 103,000 F-150 pickup trucks in the U.S. over axle bolts that may break and result in vehicle rollaway or loss of drive power, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，中国艾兰得健康正以超过 15 亿美元的估值寻求买家
item.description: 据两位知情人士透露，总部位于中国的全球营养补充剂生产商爱兰德健康控股公司（aland Health Holding）的所有者正在寻求出售其合计控股权，目标估值超过 15 亿美元。【原文：The owners of aland Health Holding, a China-based global nutritional supplement maker, are seeking to sell their combined controlling stake, targeting a valuation of more than $1.5 billion, two sources with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 美国加征关税，中国工厂减班减薪
item.description: Mike Chai 的目标是将其厨柜工厂的工资成本降低约 30%，以保持与其他中国公司的竞争力。【原文：Mike Chai aims to cut wage costs at his kitchen cabinet factory by about 30% to remain competitive against other Chinese firms, which have stopped selling to the U.S. due to steep tariffs and are now coming after his long-time customers in Australia.】

item.title: 澳大利亚联邦银行和西太平洋银行在澳大利亚央行采取行动后下调住房贷款利率
item.description: 继澳大利亚储备银行（Reserve Bank of Australia）降息之后，澳大利亚最大的贷款机构澳大利亚联邦银行（Commonwealth Bank of Australia）和第三大贷款机构西太平洋银行（Westpac Banking Corp）周二将其标准可变住房贷款利率下调了 25 个基点。【原文：Commonwealth Bank of Australia , the country's largest lender, and Westpac Banking Corp , the third-biggest, cut their standard variable home loan rates by 25 basis points on Tuesday following the Reserve Bank of Australia's rate cut.】

item.title: 皮博迪出价 38 亿美元收购英美资源集团矿山的交易下周即将举行
item.description: 皮博迪能源公司（Peabody Energy）将于8月19日宣布是否将继续以37.8亿美元竞购英美资源集团（Anglo American）的澳大利亚焦煤矿，因为该公司重新谈判降低交易价格的时间已经所剩无几。【原文：Peabody Energy is set to reveal on August 19 whether it will continue with its $3.78 billion bid for Anglo American's Australian coking coal mines, as time ticks down for it to renegotiate a lower price for the deal.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：中国敦促本土企业不要使用英伟达 H20 芯片
item.description: 彭博新闻社周二援引熟悉内情的人士的话报道称，中国当局已敦促当地公司避免使用英伟达的 H20 处理器，尤其是用于与政府相关的用途。【原文：Chinese authorities have urged local companies to avoid using Nvidia's H20 processors, particularly for government-related purposes, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行下调利率，但对前景仍持谨慎态度
item.description: 澳大利亚央行周二将其主要现金利率下调了四分之一个百分点，降至两年来的最低点3.60%，理由是通胀放缓和劳动力市场趋于宽松，但央行对进一步宽松的前景持谨慎态度。【原文：Australia's central bank on Tuesday cut its main cash rate by a quarter point to a two-year low of 3.60%, citing a slowdown in inflation and a looser labour market, though it was cautious on the prospect of further easing.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行将利率降至 3.60% 的两年低点
item.description: 澳大利亚央行周二将其主要现金利率下调了四分之一个百分点，降至两年来的最低点3.60%，理由是通胀放缓和劳动力市场趋于宽松，但央行对进一步宽松的前景持谨慎态度。【原文：Australia's central bank on Tuesday cut its main cash rate by a quarter point to a two-year low of 3.60%, citing a slowdown in inflation and a looser labour market, though it was cautious on the prospect of further easing.】

item.title: 早间新闻休战延长，下一个经济数据
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: Zero Two 加入华平投资集团，成为东南亚 Evolution 数据中心的共同所有者
item.description: 阿布扎比数字基础设施公司 Zero Two 周二表示，已投资 Evolution Data Centres，加入私募股权公司华平投资（Warburg Pincus），成为这家专注于东南亚的数据中心平台的共同所有者。【原文：Abu Dhabi-based digital infrastructure firm Zero Two has invested in Evolution Data Centres to join private equity firm Warburg Pincus as co-owner of the Southeast Asia-focused data centre platform, the companies said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行下调经济前景评级，限制生产力发展速度
item.description: 路透社悉尼8月12日电）澳大利亚央行周二下调了对经济增长的预期，同时下调了生产力的前景，这意味着该国2700万居民的生活水平和收入将下降。【原文：SYDNEY, Aug 12 (Reuters) - Australia's central bank on Tuesday slashed its forecasts for economic growth as it downgraded the outlook for productivity, implying lower living standards and incomes for the country's 27 million residents.】

item.title: 美国 7 月消费者物价可能小幅上涨；数据质量问题日益突出
item.description: 尽管由于进口关税导致家用家具和服装等商品的成本上升，可能导致衡量基本通胀率的指标创下六个月来的最大涨幅，但 7 月份美国消费者物价可能温和上涨。【原文：U.S. consumer prices likely increased moderately in July, though rising costs for goods like household furniture and apparel because of import tariffs probably resulted in a measure of underlying inflation posting its largest gain in six months.】

item.title: 分析师对日本日经指数创新高作出反应
item.description: 周二，日本日经指数（Nikkei）蓝筹股指数创下历史新高，与今年全球许多市场创下的历史最高纪录齐头并进。【原文：Japan's Nikkei gauge of blue-chip stocks powered to a record high on Tuesday, taking its cue from all-time peaks scaled by many global markets this year.】

item.title: 2025 年特朗普与中国的贸易战
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普将矛头对准了头号经济竞争对手中国，对数十亿美元的进口商品下达了一连串的关税命令，旨在缩小巨大的贸易逆差、恢复失去的制造业并削弱芬太尼贸易。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump has targeted top economic rival China with a cascade of tariff orders on billions of dollars of imported goods aimed at narrowing a wide trade deficit, bringing back lost manufacturing and crippling the fentanyl trade.】

item.title: 关税休战支撑市场情绪，亚洲股市多数走高
item.description: 受全球最大的两个经济体延长关税休战期的影响，周二亚洲股市多数上涨，而日本股市在结束长周末假期后，受科技股推动创下历史新高。【原文：Most Asian stocks rose on Tuesday, buoyed by an extension of a tariff truce between the world's two largest economies, while Japanese shares hit an all-time peak, powered by tech shares after returning from a long weekend break.】

item.title: 美元在通胀数据公布前保持涨势；澳元等待澳大利亚央行公布数据
item.description: 美元周二持稳，市场正在为当天晚些时候的一份关键消费者通胀报告做准备，该报告可能会影响美联储的降息预期。【原文：The U.S. dollar held steady on Tuesday, with markets braced for a key consumer inflation report later in the day that could shape expectations for Federal Reserve interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 澳大利亚经济活动保持稳定，商业景气有所好转
item.description: 周二的一项调查显示，得益于服务业和建筑业的强劲表现，7 月份澳大利亚商业信心指数升至三年来的最高点，尽管成本上升也给零售价格带来了上涨压力。【原文：A measure of Australian business confidence rose to a three-year high in July thanks to strength in services and construction, a survey showed on Tuesday, though rising costs also put upward pressure on retail prices.】

item.title: 马斯克指责苹果违反反垄断法，称 xAI 将采取法律行动
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周一表示，苹果公司涉嫌违反反垄断法，让除OpenAI之外的任何人工智能公司都无法在其应用商店排名中位居第一，称这是 "明确的反垄断违法行为"。【原文：Elon Musk said on Monday Apple is engaging in antitrust violations by allegedly making it impossible for any artificial intelligence company other than OpenAI to reach the No. 1 spot in its App Store rankings, calling it an "unequivocal antitrust violation."】

item.title: 中美关税暂停期延长提振贸易希望，石油上涨
item.description: 油价周二上涨，原因是美国和中国延长了提高关税的暂停期，缓解了贸易战升级将扰乱两国经济并抑制全球两大石油消费国燃料需求的担忧。【原文：Oil prices rose on Tuesday as the United States and China extended a pause on higher tariffs, easing concerns an escalation of their trade war would disrupt their economies and crimp fuel demand in the world's two largest oil consumers.】

item.title: 风险投资公司 Speciale Invest 将在 2029 年前出资 6900 万美元支持印度初创企业
item.description: 印度 Speciale Invest 风险投资公司周二表示，该公司将在未来四年内投资 60 亿卢比（约合 6900 万美元）给处于早期阶段的初创企业，投资领域包括人工智能和空间技术。【原文：India's Speciale Invest will invest 6 billion rupees ($69 million) over the next four years in early-stage startups spanning across sectors including artificial intelligence and space technology, the venture capital company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 据《非洲金融报》报道，星空娱乐公司重启出售布里斯班度假村 50% 股份的计划
item.description: 据《澳大利亚金融评论报》（Australian Financial Review）周二报道，澳大利亚明星娱乐公司（Star Entertainment）已重启出售其在布里斯班度假村 36 亿澳元（23.5 亿美元）50% 权益的努力，并与香港投资者达成协议。【原文：Australia's Star Entertainment has restarted efforts to sell its 50% interest in the A$3.6 billion ($2.35 billion) Brisbane resort, striking an agreement with its Hong Kong-based investors, the Australian Financial Review reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 立法者和专家称，特朗普与英伟达的不寻常交易引发了新的企业和国家安全风险
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）与英伟达（Nvidia）达成协议，让美国政府从其销售额中提成，以换取英伟达恢复向中国出口被禁的人工智能芯片，这颠覆了美国数十年来的国家安全政策，创造了一种全新的企业风险。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump upended decades of U.S. national security policy, creating an entirely new category of corporate risk, when he made a deal with Nvidia to give the U.S. government a cut of its sales in exchange for resuming exports of banned AI chips to China.】

item.title: 特朗普选择传统基金会的安东尼领导劳工统计局
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周一表示，他将提名经济学家E.J. Antoni担任新一任美国劳工统计局局长。此前十天，美国劳工统计局前任局长因美国就业市场表现不佳而被解雇，特朗普在没有证据的情况下指责安东尼操纵数据。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Monday said he was nominating economist E.J. Antoni as the new Bureau of Labor Statistics commissioner, ten days after firing the statistics agency's previous leader after a weak scorecard of the U.S. job market, accusing her without evidence of manipulating the figures.】

item.title: 巴西化妆品制造商 Natura 第二季度扭亏为盈
item.description: 巴西化妆品制造商 Natura 周一公布，第二季度净利润为 1.95 亿雷亚尔（合 3580 万美元），扭转了去年同期净亏损 8.59 亿雷亚尔的局面。【原文：Brazilian cosmetic maker Natura posted on Monday a second-quarter net profit of 195 million reais ($35.8 million), reversing a 859 million real net loss from the same period last year.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，花旗首席执行官在 Banamex 股权谈判期间访问墨西哥
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一援引知情人士的话报道，花旗集团首席执行官简-弗雷泽（Jane Fraser）正在墨西哥城与总统克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆（Claudia Sheinbaum）举行会谈，内容包括该银行零售部门 Banamex 可能上市的事宜。【原文：Citigroup CEO Jane Fraser is in Mexico City for talks with President Claudia Sheinbaum that include the potential public listing of the bank's retail unit Banamex, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 得克萨斯州商人因涉嫌贿赂墨西哥石油公司官员被起诉
item.description: 美国司法部周一宣布，两名得克萨斯州商人因涉嫌用 15 万美元和奢侈品贿赂墨西哥国家能源公司 Pemex 的官员以获得合同而被起诉。【原文：Two Texas businessmen were indicted for allegedly bribing officials at Mexico's state energy company Pemex with $150,000 and luxury items to secure contracts, the U.S. Justice Department announced on Monday.】

item.title: 辛克莱启动广播部门战略审查，考虑分拆风险投资公司
item.description: 辛克莱周一表示，公司董事会已授权对公司的广播业务进行战略审查，并正在考虑将其风险投资组合分离出去，这使得公司股价在延时交易中上涨了 15%。【原文：Sinclair said on Monday its board has authorized a strategic review of the company's broadcast business and it is considering a separation of its Ventures portfolio, sending its shares up 15% in extended trading.】

item.title: 化学品生产商塞拉尼斯盈利预测黯淡，股价暴跌
item.description: 化学品生产商塞拉尼斯周一预测第三季度利润低于预期，预计下半年大部分主要市场的需求将减弱，导致其股价在延时交易中下跌 14.6%。【原文：Chemicals maker Celanese forecast third-quarter profit below estimates on Monday, anticipating waning demand across most of its key markets in the second half of the year, sending its shares down 14.6% in extended trading.】
